title: China uses ideology, Iran uses religion for legit.

content.question: Which of the following describes sources of political legitimacy in China and Iran?

choices.label: Tribal kinship ties in China, and pastoralist agricultural traditions in Iran
Participatory institutions in China, and technocratic governance in Iran
Charismatic leadership in China, and military prestige in Iran
Ideology and economic performance in China, and religious authority in Iran
Bureaucratic efficiency in China, and political and civic freedoms in Iran

content.answer: Ideology and economic performance in China, and religious authority in Iran

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Compare two or more course countries based on their political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
